title: AWS Security Checklist
description: Essential security configuration checklist for AWS cloud environments.

items.title: Enable MFA for root account
items.description: Add multi-factor authentication to the root account

items.title: Configure CloudTrail logging
items.description: Enable CloudTrail in all regions for audit logging

items.title: Set up GuardDuty
items.description: Enable AWS GuardDuty for threat detection

items.title: Review IAM policies
items.description: Audit and implement least privilege IAM policies

items.title: Enable S3 bucket encryption
items.description: Encrypt all S3 buckets at rest using SSE-S3 or SSE-KMS

items.title: Configure VPC flow logs
items.description: Enable VPC flow logs for network monitoring

items.title: Set up AWS Config
items.description: Enable AWS Config for resource inventory and compliance

items.title: Enable Security Hub
items.description: Activate AWS Security Hub for centralized security findings
